trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract class for controls that allow multiple items to be selected.
trans-unit.target: 複数の項目を選択できるようにするコントロールの抽象クラスを提供します。

trans-unit.source: When you derive a class from the MultiSelector class, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> property to `true` to allow multi-selection in your control.
trans-unit.target: MultiSelector クラスからクラスを派生するときの設定、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>プロパティを`true`コントロールでの複数選択を許可する</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 新しいインスタンスを初期化、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>クラスです。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector> is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>抽象クラスは、直接インスタンス化することはできません。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector>

trans-unit.source: Starts a new selection transaction.
trans-unit.target: 選択範囲の新しいトランザクションを開始します。

trans-unit.source: The BeginUpdateSelectedItems method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: BeginUpdateSelectedItems メソッドのセット<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>に`true`</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>メソッドのセット<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>に`false`</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*><xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>このメソッドが呼び出されます。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time.
trans-unit.target: 取得または設定の複数の項目かどうかを示す値、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>一度に選択できます。

trans-unit.source: Set the CanSelectMultipleItems property to `true` in a derived class to allow multi-selection for that class.
trans-unit.target: CanSelectMultipleItems プロパティを設定`true`そのクラスの複数の選択を許可する派生クラスでします。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multiple items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> can be selected at a time; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>複数の項目がある場合、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref> 、それ以外の一度に選択<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: Commits the selected items to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 選択した項目をコミット、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: This method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `false` and updates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: このメソッドは設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>に`false`し、更新、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A>コレクションです</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>メソッドのセット<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A>に`true`</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*><xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>このメソッドが呼び出されます。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.IsUpdatingSelectedItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 示す値を取得するかどうか、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>に一括更新が実行中、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>コレクションです</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A>メソッドに設定 IsUpdatingSelectedItems `true`</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.BeginUpdateSelectedItems%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> method sets IsUpdatingSelectedItems to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A>メソッドに設定 IsUpdatingSelectedItems `false`</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.EndUpdateSelectedItems%2A> 。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> is currently performing a bulk update to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>場合、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>に一括更新が実行中、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*>コレクションですそれ以外の場合、 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.SelectedItems*> 。

trans-unit.source: Selects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: すべての項目の選択、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 場合にのみ、このメソッドを使用する<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>は`true`</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 項目を取得、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>が選択されています。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `false`, you cannot add more than one item to the SelectedItems collection.
trans-unit.target: 場合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>は`false`、SelectedItems コレクションに複数の項目を追加することはできません</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to do so will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: 操作を行うためには、例外が発生します。

trans-unit.source: The items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref> that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 内の項目、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"> </xref>が選択されています。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: すべての項目の選択を解除、 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector"></xref>です。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method regardless of whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A> is `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: かどうかに関係なく、このメソッドを使用する<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>は`true`または`false`</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MultiSelector.CanSelectMultipleItems%2A>。
